sentences.sContent: It's just one of those words that's got so many negative connotations.
sentences.sCn: 它只是那些有很多负面内涵意义的词之一。

synos.tran: 内涵；含蓄；暗示，隐含意义；储蓄的东西（词、语等）

remMethod.val: con + not(注意) + ation → 全部注意到的内容 → 言外之意

trans.tranCn: 含蓄, 储蓄的东西(词、语等), 内涵
trans.tranOther: The connotations of a particular word or name are the ideas or qualities which it makes you think of
